TABLE.NAME: rsg_inscription
TABLE.COMMENT: This table saves information about a sign-up of rsg.

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: The status of the RSG at the inscription.

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: The time the settings for this assign module instance were last modified.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The time the settings for this assign module instance were last modified.

KEY.NAME: primary
KEY.COMMENT: The unique id for this RSG inscription.

INDEX.NAME: mdl_rsginsc_num_uix
INDEX.COMMENT: The unique numeroidentification for this RSG inscription.

TABLE.NAME: rsg_admin_regions
TABLE.COMMENT: This table contains the name of the administrative regions.

KEY.NAME: primary
KEY.COMMENT: The unique id for this assignment instance.

TABLE.NAME: rsg_coord_office
TABLE.COMMENT: The coord office and its administrative region.

KEY.NAME: primary
KEY.COMMENT: The unique id for this assignment instance.

TABLE.NAME: mdl_rsg_mfa_import
TABLE.COMMENT: The data importation (CSV file with RSG représentées) from Ministère de la Famille (MFA).

FIELD.NAME: graceend
FIELD.COMMENT: Datestamp of when the grace is terminated.

FIELD.NAME: gracenotice
FIELD.COMMENT: 1 if email about grace period is already sent.

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Datestamp of when the record was created.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Datestamp of when the record was last modified.

KEY.NAME: primary
KEY.COMMENT: The unique id for a RSG représentée that has the rights to access the capsules for free.

INDEX.NAME: mdl_rsgmfaimpo_num_uix
INDEX.COMMENT: The unique numeroidentification for this RSG inscription.
